title: Cuda 9.1?
body_html:
Hi, I'm trying to build the current Pytorch-git, with Cuda 9.1
My working environment:
Ubuntu 18.0.41
GCC 6.4.0

$ lsb_release -a
No LSB modules are available.
Distributor ID: Ubuntu
Description:    Ubuntu 18.04.1 LTS
Release:        18.04
Codename:       bionic
$ g++ --version
g++ (Ubuntu 6.4.0-17ubuntu1) 6.4.0 20180424
Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
$ gcc --version
gcc (Ubuntu 6.4.0-17ubuntu1) 6.4.0 20180424
Copyright (C) 2017 Free Software Foundation, Inc.
This is free software; see the source for copying conditions.  There is NO
warranty; not even for MERCHANTABILITY or FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.

Unfortunately, I always get an ERROR message to let me set CUDA_HOST_COMPILER to gcc-5 (gcc-6 or higher version are NOT supported).

After I set `CUDA_HOST_COMPILER=/usr/bin/gcc-5', I got the following ERROR messages:
